application

Class captureImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.captureImage

  • public class captureImage
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows to take picture using the webcam, need download javaCV
    Author:
    pierre

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      captureImage(java.lang.String title)
      Constructor for the class captureImage be careful not to change the title otherwise, you could have compatibility problems when processing the database using the sort function in C++.
      captureImage(java.lang.String title, boolean isRef)
      Method you have to implement to set up the title of your (be careful if your image has to be reference or to compare one)

    • Constructor Detail

      • captureImage

        public captureImage(java.lang.String title)
        Constructor for the class captureImage be careful not to change the title otherwise, you could have compatibility problems when processing the database using the sort function in C++.
        Parameters:
        title - give as an argument the title of file (default: "image")

      • captureImage

        public captureImage(java.lang.String title,
            boolean isRef)
        Method you have to implement to set up the title of your (be careful if your image has to be reference or to compare one)
        Parameters:
        title - see Constructor
        isRef - true: reference image in your database, false: image to compare
